name: Paddle Battle (itch) (Kabeltattaren)
description:
Controls:

This game was made for an arcade machine, but works well with both Xbox-controller and keyboard. 

  • Xbox Controls: 
    Left Joystick - move up/down
    A (green) - shoot
  • Keyboard Controls:
    WASD / Arrow keys - move up/down
    L shift / R shift - shoot

__________________________________

This game is local multiplayer only. There is no networking, and no AI opponent ^^
